contentencoded:
This final note: Today is National Cat Day.

To mark the occasion, the private car service Uber has been doing something special.

For $20, they'll bring you a cat. And cupcakes.

A total of 15 minutes of kitten time.

Proceeds to your local cat shelter.
title: Happy National Cat Day
